name: BlitzMech
description:
BlitzMech - Do the Mission!

The game is 10 levels. 

Controls:

  • A : Move left
  • D: Move Right
  • Mouse to Aim 
  • Left to Shoot.
  • Q to increase your Jump Height
  • E to increase your Top Speed
  • 1 or 2 to change weapons
  • ESC to exit game

This is my first game I've ever released. I  did almost all of the art and a good part of the programming.

The explosion is from Ansimuz, who does amazing pixel art.  

The planet is from Deep-Fold. Thank for the awesome planets.

This game was possible because of tutorial makers like Shaun Spalding and Sam Spade Game Dev. Thank you both for all of the great lessons.  Thank you MechJam. This was a great experience to get me to actually release something. I hope you enjoy playing it.

I would love any feedback you have to give. I am terrible with sound, so I might update it in the future with better sounds and actual music.
